doc.description: Stream all IMU data to external High-Speed SD-logger via SPI

configure.name: HS_LOG_SPI_DEV
configure.description: SPI bus which the logger is connected to (default: spi1)

configure.name: HS_LOG_SPI_SLAVE_IDX
configure.description: SPI slave which the logger is connected to (default: SPI_SLAVE1)

makefile.raw:
HS_LOG_SPI_DEV ?= spi1 HS_LOG_SPI_DEV_LOWER=$(shell echo $(HS_LOG_SPI_DEV) | tr A-Z a-z) HS_LOG_SPI_DEV_UPPER=$(shell echo $(HS_LOG_SPI_DEV) | tr a-z A-Z)
HS_LOG_SPI_SLAVE_IDX ?= spi_slave1 HS_LOG_SPI_SLAVE_IDX_LOWER=$(shell echo $(HS_LOG_SPI_SLAVE_IDX) | tr A-Z a-z) HS_LOG_SPI_SLAVE_IDX_UPPER=$(shell echo $(HS_LOG_SPI_SLAVE_IDX) | tr a-z A-Z)
include $(CFG_SHARED)/spi_master.makefile
